Interface ClientConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ClientConnection
Interface of a ClientConnection server side.

  • Method Details

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Closes the socket connection server side.

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(Observer<CommunicationMessage> messageReceiver)
      Adds an observer.
      Parameters:
      messageReceiver - the class which handles the incoming messages.

    • asyncSend

      void asyncSend(CommunicationMessage message)
      Sends a message asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent.

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Returns whether the connection is active or not.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is alive server side, false otherwise.
